turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order three pizzas from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size do you want those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One needs to be olive and chicken, the second one is to cheese and pepperoni and sausage, and the third one is meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, let me confirm your order with you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 medium pizzas, 1 olives and chicken, 1 pepperoni and sausage, and 1 meat lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And can we add extra cheese to all of them, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, there will be a charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, will you be dining in, picking up, or having your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be texted to you, just show your receipt at the counter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.
